answers.answer: Hi Ninja27!I've had the same symptoms as you: shaky (tremors in hands and body), anxiety, body aches, twitches, insomnia.  Doctors ruled out thyroid, ms, Parkinson, diabetes and low vitamin b deficiency.  i was feeling really crappy, so I took matters into my own hands.  Magnesium deficiency is what I came up with, and it's hard to detect if you're deficient, so doctors don't test for it. I've been taking magnesium supplements, and mag oil for a few days now, and though I'm not 100% okay, I can tell you I definitely feel better.  Try magnesium, it really helped me so far.
